org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin
Class LoggingApplication

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.Application
      org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin.LoggingApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Terminal.ErrorListener, URIHandler, Serializable
public abstract class LoggingApplication
extends Application

Application subclass that provides subclasses with a Logger and logs and displays any exceptions thrown in an overlay error window.

Since:
1.0.51
See Also:
